original: intros d p t H. induction H using liste_reconnait_ind. - simpl. auto. - simpl. assert (term_high hd <= term_high_0 (tcons hd tl)) by apply Nat.le_max_l. pose proof dt_non_empty_5 d a hd as [n Hn]. rewrite H1 in Hn. apply Hn. apply IHliste_reconnait. simpl. apply H2. - simpl. apply IHliste_reconnait.
